logical_accuracy.description: Accuracy of the logical analysis provided by the agent.

reasoning_traceability.description: The ability to follow the reasoning process of the agent.

step_efficiency.description: The number of steps taken to reach the answer compared to the minimum number needed.

response_time.description: The time it takes for the agent to provide an answer.

agent_collaboration.description: Effectiveness of the interaction between different agents to solve the task.

reliance_on_external_data.description: The degree to which the agent relies on external data vs. its own knowledge base.

comprehensiveness.description: The thoroughness of the answer provided, including all relevant details.

novelty_of_approach.description: Degree of innovation in the agent's approach to solving the question.

correctness_of_conclusion.description: Whether the agent's final conclusion is correct in the context of the question.

misconceptions.description: Presence of any logical misconceptions or errors in the reasoning process.
